@graph.name: mrsa AMR gene detection
@graph.description:
Identification of AMR genes in an assembled bacterial genome

## Associated Tutorial

This workflows is part of the tutorial [Identification of AMR genes in an assembled bacterial genome](https://training.galaxyproject.org/training-material/topics/genome-annotation/tutorials/amr-gene-detection/tutorial.html), available in the [GTN](https://training.galaxyproject.org)

## Features

* Includes [Galaxy Workflow Tests](https://training.galaxyproject.org/training-material/faqs/gtn/workflow_run_test.html)
